member.name: T:Microsoft.Ddue.Tools.JavaScriptDeclarationSyntaxGenerator
member.summary: This is a JavaScript declaration syntax generator that is used to add a JavaScript Syntax section to each generated API topic.

remarks.para: This version differs from the ScriptSharpDeclarationSyntaxGenerator in that it looks for a <scriptSharp /> element in the <api> node and, if found, only then will it apply the casing rules to the member name. If not present, no casing rules are applied to the member names thus it is suitable for use with regular JavaScript such as that used in AjaxDoc projects.

In order to use this script generator with Script# content, the Sandcastle reflection data file must first be transformed using the XSL transformation ProductionTransforms\FixScriptSharp.xsl so that the necessary changes are made to it.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Ddue.Tools.JavaScriptDeclarationSyntaxGenerator.HasAttribute(System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator,System.String)
member.summary: Check to see if the given attribute exists on the entry
member.param: The reflection information
The attribute for which to search
member.returns: True if found or false if not found

member.name: M:Microsoft.Ddue.Tools.JavaScriptDeclarationSyntaxGenerator.IsUnsupported(System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator,Microsoft.Ddue.Tools.SyntaxWriter)
member.summary: Check to see if the element is unsupported
member.param: The reflection information
The writer to which the "unsupported" message is written.
member.returns: True if unsupported or false if it is supported

member.summary: Convert the given name to camel case
member.param: The name to modify
member.returns: The name converted to camel case

member.summary: Read the containing type name from the entry
member.param: The reflection information
member.returns: The containing type name if found or null if not found

member.summary: Read the full containing type name from the entry
member.param: The reflection information
member.returns: The full containing type name prefixed with its namespace or null if not found

member.name: M:Microsoft.Ddue.Tools.JavaScriptDeclarationSyntaxGenerator.ReadFullTypeName(System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator)
member.summary: Read the full type name from the entry
member.param: The reflection information
member.returns: The full type name prefixed with its namespace or null if not found

member.name: M:Microsoft.Ddue.Tools.JavaScriptDeclarationSyntaxGenerator.ReadMemberName(System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator)
member.summary: Read the member name from the entry
member.param: The reflection information
member.remarks: If a <scriptSharp /> element exists in the entry, the casing rule is applied to the member name. If not present, it is returned as-is. The casing rule will convert the name to camel case unless the member is marked with System.PreserveCaseAttribute.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Ddue.Tools.SyntaxWriter.RenderReferenceLinks
member.summary: This is used to indicate whether or not the syntax writer should render reference links as actual links.
member.value: The default is false to render reference link elements as identifiers instead. If set to true, it will render them as actual clickable links if the target can be resolved.
